txt.en: 'No! I don't want to die! Let me go!'
Bedwyr has escaped. Melona should be told
Melona is in Sedgemead, waiting to hear of your encounter with her bounty.
Melona told you the brigand Bedwyr, her latest bounty, should be somewhere to the north-east, not far away.
Melona, an expert hunter of bounties, has been injured and needs your help to collect her latest bounty.

'Hey, you there. Are you interested in making some coin?

'I am a bounty hunter, and I am very near to tracking down my latest quarry. But fate is cruel: I landed poorly on my ankle, and now I cannot move with the speed required to finish the job. If you put an end to the bounty I seek, I will share the reward with you. Are we agreed?

'Good. The target is a brigand named Bedwyr, an ally to half-orcs and a disreputable ruffian. Track him to the north-east, among the rocks.'
'This is your last chance, stranger! Bounty hunters have a way of coming to bad ends when they try to chase me! If you insist on following this course, you will not survive!'
'The target is a brigand named Bedwyr, an ally to half-orcs and a disreputable ruffian. Track him to the north-east, among the rocks.'
'He got away? This bounty eludes me again!\n\n'Unacceptable. He will not get away forever! I swear it!'
